These pages are a collection of notes I've written mostly for my own sake to help me remember subtle arguments or how to think about concepts that constantly confuse me. In the hopes that maybe my way of thinking resonates with others, I've decided to share these notes here.

Please feel free to reach out if you want to connect on these topics.
